meanings.definition: Regret or feel remorse for (an action)
meanings.sent1: She rues missing the bus every morning.
meanings.sent2: He rues not studying for the test.
meanings.sent3: The cat rues knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: The old man rues not spending more time with his family.
meanings.sent5: The student rues forgetting her homework on the kitchen table.

meanings.definition: Bitterly regret (something one has done or allowed to happen)
meanings.sent1: She rues the day she decided to quit her job.
meanings.sent2: He rues the missed opportunity to travel abroad.
meanings.sent3: The chef rues adding too much salt to the soup.
meanings.sent4: The athlete rues not training harder for the competition.
meanings.sent5: The teacher rues losing the student's assignment before grading it.

meanings.definition: Feel remorse or regret for (an action)
meanings.sent1: She rues her harsh words during the argument.
meanings.sent2: He rues the decision to sell his childhood home.
meanings.sent3: The child rues breaking his favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The traveler rues not packing an umbrella for the trip.
meanings.sent5: The musician rues missing the note during the performance.
